docs.lead_paragraph: A NEW ENGLAND physician wrote to the Journal of the American Medical Association a few years ago to protest a consulting editor's statement that it was unwise and unsafe to raise children on a vegetarian diet.
docs.snippet: A NEW ENGLAND physician wrote to the Journal of the American Medical Association a few years ago to protest a consulting editor's statement that it was unwise and unsafe to raise children on a vegetarian diet.
